blueprint.description: Installs nvm on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [NVM](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) is a version manager for Node.js, designed to be installed per-user, and invoked per-shell. Please note that the Windows version uses a [seperate NVM project](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows).
blueprint.name: NVM
blueprint.title: NVM
